dialog.name: Benjamin
dialog.text: Can you put me to 23A Richter Street?

dialog.name: Benjamin
dialog.text: Hey Henry! This is Ben, did you hear about James’s store?

dialog.name: Henry
dialog.text: Sup Ben! I haven't, has James finally got what he deserves?

dialog.name: Benjamin
dialog.text: I heard he paid off the building inspector. With the recent incident it’s coming back to bite.

dialog.name: Henry
dialog.text: Agh, all these bloody rumours, seriously it’s killing my business.

dialog.name: Henry
dialog.text: Ben look, I’ve got cash saved up. I'll pay if you can find out who’s slandering me.

dialog.name: Henry
dialog.text: I want to sue them for this hell!

dialog.name: Benjamin
dialog.text: Hmmm I'll think about it. Either way we are going to make that prick pay for his betrayal!

dialog.name: Benjamin
dialog.text: He cuts us out of his business like a snake and now he complains!

dialog.name: Henry
dialog.text: For real! Anyway, ring me up again if you want to take me up on the offer.

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Need a quick line to 8 Lake View

dialog.name: Hannah
dialog.text: Get me through to 41st Arlbrick Lane.
